column1: @KamalaHarris did the coronavirus start in Spain?  Switzerland?  Yemen?  Why did your running mate oppose holding China accountable?

It’s not just the for-profit economy that is suffering and will suffer from the COVID outbreak. Civil society – all those millions of non-profits around the country – are getting hammered too. (3/15)

The Coronavirus is a real emergency and the federal government can and should act to mitigate the economic pain from this situation. Unfortunately this House response bill is Rube Goldberg machine of unfunded mandates and tax benefits that will only end up hurting workers.

We all agree workers affected by the Coronavirus need financial assistance. The only question is how to finance it. The House bill forces businesses to front the money. Instead our amendment would give workers cash directly from govt. https://t.co/xzg0oZlAaI
